column4: Why does my Restricted Linux Driver keep uninstalling my new nvidia drivers and installing the old ones when i enable it ??
because that's what it's supposed to do.  it's supposed to make the restricted ubuntu one be the only one in use.  disable it if you dont want it
you mean when you enable the restricted driver, the one you installed gets disabled, right?
enabling restricted disables all other drivers for that part.  you can only use 1 driver at a time.  it's either the one you compiled or the one it offers
